sourcesContent:
<form (submit)="onlogin(loginform)" #loginform="ngForm">

    <input type="text"
    ngModel name="enteredUsername"
    placeholder="Username"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredUsername="ngModel"/>

    <input type="password"
    ngModel name="enteredPassword"
    placeholder="Password"
    required
    minlength="1"
    #enteredPassword="ngModel"/>

    <button type="submit">Login</button>
</form>
